instruction.en: Press the reset button three times within 1.5 seconds. The led flashes green.

hint.en:
Lifeline. All run-time reporting is addressed to this group. Only one node can be assigned to this association group. 
Default: 1 (Homey's ID)
:Lifeline association group (report to other devices): Include command classes: Battery report, Notification report, and Device Reset Locally notification, Binary report.
